NewsArticle.Title: Dark Ages 7.04
NewsArticle.Content:
Dark Ages has now updated to 7.04 . If you are currently using 7.03, you can just download the small patcher file in the download section of the website. The update has fixed the following bugs.
- Items with long names can now be withdrawn from the bank without disconnecting the player.
- Players who log off from Medenia and re-login 3 hours later in Temuair will no longer disconnect.
- Hats and helmets should now display the appropriate hair color instead of the default purple color.
- Players can no longer use the exploit to attack while in spirit/ghost form.
